mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, content, writer_id, category_id) VALUES (#{request.title}, #{request.content}, #{request.writerId}, #{request.categoryId});
mapper.select: SELECT p.content, p.created_timestamp, pa.stored_filename, pa.original_filename, pa.extension, pa.sequence FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN post_attachment pa ON p.id = pa.post_id WHERE p.id = #{postId} ORDER BY pa.sequence
SELECT id, view_count, like_count, IF(h.post_id IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS is_hot FROM post p LEFT OUTER JOIN hot_post h ON p.id = h.post_id WHERE id = #{postId}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM post WHERE id = #{postId} AND writer_id = #{requesterId})
